Thymeleaf Select

Descripción

Select box with dynamic options


File Template: ✅


Prefix

thyme:select


Scopes

html


Snippet de código

<label for="${1:select}">${2:Label}:</label>
<select id="${1:select}" th:field="*{${1:select}}">
	<option th:each="option : ${3:options}" th:value="${option.value}" th:text="${option.label}"></option>
</select>
